publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1061 Mr Tom McCabe on behalf of the Parliamentary Bureau: Approval of SSI's—That the Parliament agrees that the following orders be approved – The Electricity Lands and Water Undertakings (Rateable Values) (Scotland) Amendment Order 2000 (SSI 2000/draft) and, The Docks and Harbours (Rateable Values) (Scotland) Order 2000 (SSI 2000/draft). Supported by: Iain Smith*
